sense.def:
The death toll in an accident
je število ljudi, ki so umrli v neki nesreči.

seg.quote: By Wednesday the death toll had risen to more than 40.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
takes a toll
ali
takes its toll
, povzroča trpljenje.

seg.quote: The walking was beginning to take its toll on all of us.

sense.def:
A toll
je znesek, ki ga moramo plačati, da smemo uporabiti cesto ali most.

Kadar nekdo
tolls a bell
ali kadar zvon
tolls
, nekdo počasi in dalj časa zvoni, pogosto v znamenje, da je nekdo umrl.
